text: Gurcharan Singh Galib is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Lok Sabha, the lower house of the Parliament of India as a member of the Indian National Congress. ==References== ==External links== *Official biographical sketch in Parliament of India website Category:1933 births Category:Lok Sabha members from Punjab, India Category:13th Lok Sabha members Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:Living people
title: Gurcharan Singh Galib
